trans-unit.source: What happens when you add Mobile Services to a Javascript app by using Visual Studio Connected Services | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: What happens when you add Mobile Services to a Javascript app by using Visual Studio Connected Services | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes what happened to your Azure Mobile Services project in Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Describes what happened to your Azure Mobile Services project in Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: What happens to my Javascript project when I add Azure Mobile Services using Connected Visual Studio Services?
trans-unit.target: What happens to my Javascript project when I add Azure Mobile Services using Connected Visual Studio Services?

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAzure.MobileServices.WinJS** NuGet package was installed, including the Azure Mobile Service library in the `js\MobileServices.js` file.
trans-unit.target: The **WindowsAzure.MobileServices.WinJS** NuGet package was installed, including the Azure Mobile Service library in the `js\MobileServices.js` file.

trans-unit.source: Connection string values for Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Connection string values for Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: In the `services\mobileServices\settings` folder, a new JavaScript (.js) file with a **MobileServiceClient** was generated that contains the selected mobile service's application URL and application key.
trans-unit.target: In the `services\mobileServices\settings` folder, a new JavaScript (.js) file with a **MobileServiceClient** was generated that contains the selected mobile service's application URL and application key.

trans-unit.source: References to `MobileServices.js` and the settings file were added to `default.html`.
trans-unit.target: References to `MobileServices.js` and the settings file were added to `default.html`.

trans-unit.source: In the services folder, Connected Services configuration files were added.
trans-unit.target: In the services folder, Connected Services configuration files were added.
